name: Rolling Up!
description:
Rolling Up! is a game that pushes the boundaries of your speed and reaction. Now, let's control the Cube and conquer the world by overcoming challenges.

Rolling Up! is a super addictive puzzle game that will get you hooked!

The most challenging and fun game of 2018! Keep your cube on the platform while it's rolling up! Beware of the obstacles.

Cube control is very easy but it's very hard to reach high scores!

Challenge your friends for the highest score!

How to play?
Drag the cube left or right and avoid all obstacles. Do not deviate from track! Come on! Relentless pursuit of super speed. You can be faster along with the music rhythm.

Features:
• One-touch control & simple operation
• Stunning 3D stereo visual
• A challenge to speed and reflex
• Fun and easy to learn gameplay
• Amazing graphics and soundtrack
• One finger control
• Different obstacles and experience every time
• Endless gameplay

Follow and contact us:
It’s pleasant to receive your valuable suggestions. We invite you join us in game improvement and upgrade. Contact us!
